title: This account is Cursed
body:
After being Un-ban, It's been a fucking curse for me and My MMR. It's been a Year and 4 months since this account been UN-permaban, but It came at a Cost, I haven't got any ganks in any of my games, When I'm In Role, My Jungle Ignores me like I'm not even in the game anymore. 

It's been going on so long and It's really Frustrating to deal with, I feel like my Negative Attitude is coming back due to this Curse I have on this account. 

I don't why I don't get any Ganks, I'm really positive all games but I'm GETTING AT MY LIMIT, and I'm ready to Burst out of Rage of being frustrated by this No Gank  Curse I have on this account.

replies.body: Not getting ganks? Learn proper wave management and trading stance to setup the ganks before to make it enticing for the jgler to gank.
But me {{champion:157}} , me push , me tower dive , me die , me blame jungle !

But wait!! There's more!!!

Dem {{champion:157}} will never learn and always keep doing the same bad plays cos fancy plays r teh fancy!!
Don't forget... blame the jungler after that!! ALWAYS blame the jungler !!

Glad the days of blaming the support is over. 

But it's {{champion:157}} , maybe he'll find a way to blame the support and jungler.

oh there always gonna be an adc that has 40 cs at 20 minutes and blames his support for warding dont worry 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

how did you get unbanned from a permaban?

also i can only guess: you play stuff like teemo top.
no cc to help set up a gank and always pushing in.
Year and 4 months lines up with the Unban Experiment they did.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

I dont know what to tell ya bud

Looking over your OP.gg, the thing I see most is that you die a lot.

Junglers look for where they can make the most impact, and that normally means ganking for winning lanes. They also aim at even lanes, to tip the balance. Your first death at minute 2,3,20,4,4,2 creates a pattern where the jungler would generally not want to go to your lane.

Your CS is generally fine, so you have room to sacrifice. Recall more often, which will sacrifice some CS, but it can prevent giving kills to the enemy team. You'll make your lane more attractive for your jungler. They may be able to help you get more kills early, which will give you the ability to catch back up on the farm you sacrificed.
I hope I'm never on the same team as you. Hint: And it's not because I think you're cursed.

I think that in itself is a curse on him, that's how curses work.

Y'know, for people who believe in curses.
